entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
